title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.

Expected Behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item should be selectable without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the view.
